attributes.review: This app made be break my ribs 🙈 and told me to KILL MYSELF 😔 I was going to then it said before you slice your fingers and I did💅 I have no idea how I managed typing but this app needs to be BANISHED ❌ it took my beautiful tik tok away as well. attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: As soon as I booted it up my entire iPad shut down and restarted. I tried it again but then it deleted everything on my device. Honestly I think it’s some type of spyware so the government can keep tabs on everyone. I’m pretty sure it’s taking everyone’s personal information. This is the biggest breach of privacy ever!! Apple do you self a favor and delete this app!!
attributes.title: Worst app of all time

attributes.review:
He’s rude, racist towards many minorities, has a mentally where he is the best & everyone should bow down to him, puts down other people who don’t agree with him, PAID for someone to do his SAT’s, a full-time joke, not smart what-so-ever (can’t even read)....

attributes.review: this app is a complete waste of your storage space. it crashed my entire phone as soon as i opened it and now it is causing my phone to glitch. as well as it broke into my home, ate all my food and crashed on my couch. i cannot recommend enough for people to NOT download this app. it’s literally trying on my lingerie and walking around my house. it has no respect for privacy
attributes.title: do not download

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to feed my family but when I downloaded it to order oranges I found out it was all a scam. My children needed food and I didn’t have any but this millionaire 🍊 couldn’t bare to spare a few coins for food. Next time think first before you falsely advertise oranges in America I thought the president was one too but then I found out it was just an old rich man
attributes.title: Ruined my life

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be a good source of entertainment for my depressed cat who got ran over by a truck. little did I know that this app causes you to get COVID-19!!! My whole family got sick and died, and now my cat won’t stop chanting tRuMp 2020! My cat is black with grey stripes, but after getting this app he turned into a Cheeto! DONT GET THIS APP!!! IT WILL CURSE YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY! All of my body parts turned into Cheetos, and my cat ate my leg. Thanks a lot 🙄😡😡😡

wow, the destruction this app has caused me:( do to this app i have now lost my cat and mother, the only 2 people in my family. this app sent president trump my location. which i am fine with because i trust this man very much! because he is so kind hearted he wanted to come to my home for a surprise visit!!! however when he broke into my house to surprise me he did not close the door, my cat got out and was immediately ran over by his limo😭our cat was the most important thing in the world to my mom. due to the loss she had 4 seizures, but what put her over the edge was she died of excitement when she met president trump:( rip mom rip cat. this app has ruined my life
attributes.title: caused multiple deaths in home

The way that it is formatted is so confusing too my mom downloaded it as well and wasn’t able to get to anywhere that she wanted it too. I guess it exemplifies the man himself.
